name: Stalker

skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Heals this Champion by 10% of the damage dealt.

skills.name: Tear Apart
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 15% chance of placing a 25% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1
